name: Stock Up!
description:
In this game you play as an ant that has to stock up some food for the winter!
There are 2 Game Modes:
Strikeout mode: You get 3 chances to get good food while a timer plays in between, do not let the timer run out or get bad food or else a heap of snow will fall, limiting the space you have, if you touch the snow… well your dead!
Winter Frenzy Mode: The snow is slowly closing in! Get enough food to shelter yourself in before the snow gets you!
